page.title: 03A Typical Day.
page.content: Robert Temple is a boy of 11 yrs 7.50 Awaken ,dressed 8.00 Downstairs for breakfast 8.10 Upstairs for wash, brush teeth 8.20 Forgot book, get it from bedroom 8.21 Brush hair, run downstairs 8.25 Forgot trunks, upstairs for trunks 8.30 Grab bag and coat 8.40 Run across Stanley Gardens 8.45 Call in shop for mints 9.00 Torture starts in school 11.15 Torture relieved (swimming) 12.15 Arrive back late for Dinner 3.45 End of torture 4.05 Run across Stanley Gardens, grab tea. 6.30 Go to St. John's (First Aid) 10.30 Bed, peaceful reading, ending a hectic day.
